articles.author: Anna Gronewold
articles.title: Pompeo to governors: China is watching you
articles.description: The Secretary of State warns state officials that China "is working you."
articles.content:
Saying that China's efforts have become more methodical than ever, Pompeo told the governors to verify business inquiries and not to make separate individual deals with China that could undermine national policy.
"And, in fact, whether you are viewed by the … [+2500 chars]
